        fully functioned text drawing method
        Parameters:
        x - x pos of the top left of the text box
        y - y pos of the top left of the text box
        width - width of the text box
        height - height of the text box
        horzAlign - horizontal alignment within the text box
        vertAlign - vertical alignment within the text box
        font - the font to use
        c - the color to draw the text in
        text - the text to draw

      • drawTextWrap

        public static float drawTextWrap(float x,
                 float y,
                 float width,
                 float height,
                 int horzAlign,
                 int vertAlign,
                 org.newdawn.slick.UnicodeFont font,
                 org.newdawn.slick.Color c,
                 java.lang.String baseText)
        draw a text box on the screen at a given position and alignment
        Parameters:
        x - x pos of the top left of the text box
        y - the y pos of the the top left of the text box
        width - width of the text box
        height - height of the text box
        horzAlign - horizontal alignment of the text within the text box
        vertAlign - vertical alignment of the text within the text box
        font - the font to use
        c - the color to use
        baseText - the text to print
        Returns:
        returns the height of the text drawn

      • filterDrawPosition

        public static float filterDrawPosition(float original)
        adjusts a floating point value to match a real pixel value of the current display window. prevents visual taring
        Parameters:
        original - the float position
        Returns:
        the adjust position (moved to the nearest (floored) pixel)
